sourcesContent:
import styled from 'styled-components' import HomeButton from './HomeButton' import MenuItem from './MenuItem' import Blurb from './Blurb' import { signIn, signOut, useSession } from 'next-auth/client' let Container = styled.div` height: 100vh; width: 30vw; padding: 10vmin; position: fixed; box-sizing: border-box; ` let MenuContainer = styled.div` margin: 1rem 0; ` export default function Sidebar() { const [ session ] = useSession() return {!session && <> Not signed in
} {session && <> Signed in as {session.user.credentials}
} about site rules terms of service privacy }
